description: Chihiro is in the process of moving to a new town when her family stumbles upon the entrance to the spirit world. During her adventure she matures from a whiny, self-centered, and pessimistic child to a hard-working, responsible, optimistic young girl who has learned to care for others. She is renamed "Sen" (ÂçÉ, sen?, lit. "a thousand") by the proprietor of the bathhouse, Yubaba.
name: Ogino Chihiro
